website_summaries.verdict: Stainless steel construction and a good midrange price point make this chocolate fountain an appealing alternative to renting one from a wedding supply store. It has nearly the same capacity as commercial models, and is easy to clean after use.
pros: Stainless steel base and tiers provide sleek appearance and smooth cascading action
Auger delivers product without electric pump
Heating element keeps chocolate hot enough to flow
cons: Electric motor generates loud noise during operation
Some users report temperature control problems
Instructions may be difficult to read or non-existent

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Used this Christmas eve and it was a HUGE hit !!! It was pretty easy to clean afterwards as long as you do it right away . I had it on for 4 to 5 hours and the chocolate kept flowing nicely even as the chocolate was getting to be a smaller amount as it was used . I put out strawberries , Apple wedges , rice crispy treats ,gaffer cookies , graham crackers , marshmallows and pretzels . The strawberries , Apple's and rice crispy treats were all gone everyone liked those the best . We will probably use this for most of our family parties for now on .
